title: Tyke
author: Tyke
content: The #Bitcoin History Book 2008-2024 is accelerating towards completion for summer 2024 release!2015 write up is underway:https://twitter.com/CryptoBooksAlt/status/1709638784042594572Original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441233.0

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: This is interesting, it will serve as guide to as many that will be interested in reading to learn more about bitcoin, there's much and lots of efforts contributed towards this project which you have already put in together and hope to see the launch come up as planned in the coming year 2024, I've also seen the in main thread and lots that had already been discussed and wish nothing but success over this project and development.

comments.author: Tyke
comments.body: I am looking forward to completing it, but patience is the key. Bitcoin has had an intersting journey so far.
